lines.name: Unnatural Instinct

explicitModifiers.text: Allocated Small Passive Skills in Radius grant nothing
Grants all bonuses of Unallocated Small Passive Skills in Radius

lines.flavourText:
"I don't know how I know, 
I just know that I know."

lines.name: Bloodnotch

explicitModifiers.text: (40-60)% of Damage taken from Stunning Hits is Recovered as Life

lines.flavourText:
At the core of the warrior's spirit,
a fierce determination burns,
igniting their capacity to endure.

lines.name: Ancestral Vision

explicitModifiers.text: +(5-10) to Dexterity
Modifiers to Chance to Suppress Spell Damage also apply to Chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments at 50% of their Value

lines.flavourText:
The spirits of our ancestors guided us from the Archipelago to the continent.
Inextricably, the purity of our souls is linked to the ones who came before us.

lines.name: Grand Spectrum

explicitModifiers.text: +7% to all Elemental Resistances per Grand Spectrum
+1 to Minimum Endurance Charges per Grand Spectrum
5% increased Maximum Life per Grand Spectrum

lines.flavourText: Skin like steel tempered by bright flames.

lines.name: Immutable Force

explicitModifiers.text: (505-991)% increased Stun and Block Recovery

lines.flavourText:
How simple a power, on which empires turn,
when one man stands firm and says, "I refuse."

lines.name: Emperor's Wit

explicitModifiers.text: (4-6)% increased Intelligence
30% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
3% increased Character Size

lines.flavourText:
Language is a tool that can be used to build walls 
or tear them down.

lines.name: Stormshroud

explicitModifiers.text: +(10-15)% to Lightning Resistance
Modifiers to Chance to Avoid being Shocked apply to all Elemental Ailments

lines.flavourText:
The true secret of the elements
is that all are one and the same.

lines.name: Glorious Vanity

explicitModifiers.text:
Bathed in the blood of (143-7988) sacrificed in the name of Ahuana
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Vaal

Bathed in the blood of (134-7974) sacrificed in the name of Xibaqua
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Vaal

Bathed in the blood of (203-7989) sacrificed in the name of Doryani
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Vaal
Historic

lines.flavourText: They believed themselves the pinnacle of civilisation, but that height toppled their empire.

lines.name: Might of the Meek

explicitModifiers.text: 50% increased Effect of non-Keystone Passive Skills in Radius
Notable Passive Skills in Radius grant nothing

lines.flavourText: Enough mice can kill a wolf.

lines.name: Militant Faith

explicitModifiers.text:
Carved to glorify (2013-9966) new faithful converted by High Templar Dominus
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Templars

Carved to glorify (2008-9975) new faithful converted by High Templar Avarius
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Templars

Carved to glorify (2072-9989) new faithful converted by High Templar Maxarius
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Templars
4% increased Area Damage per 10 Devotion
1% increased Minion Attack and Cast Speed per 10 Devotion
4% reduced Duration of Curses on you per 10 Devotion
4% increased Elemental Damage per 10 Devotion
+2% to all Elemental Resistances per 10 Devotion
1% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras per 10 Devotion
Channelling Skills deal 4% increased Damage per 10 Devotion
4% increased Totem Damage per 10 Devotion
3% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments on Enemies per 10 Devotion
3% increased Defences from Equipped Shield per 10 Devotion
4% reduced Elemental Ailment Duration on you per 10 Devotion
Regenerate 0.6 Mana per Second per 10 Devotion
4% increased Brand Damage per 10 Devotion
1% reduced Mana Cost of Skills per 10 Devotion
Minions have +60 to Accuracy Rating per 10 Devotion
Historic

lines.flavourText: They believed themselves the utmost faithful, but that conviction became oppression.

lines.name: Brutal Restraint

explicitModifiers.text:
Denoted service of (583-7972) dekhara in the akhara of Asenath
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Maraketh

Denoted service of (645-7994) dekhara in the akhara of Nasima
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Maraketh

Denoted service of (685-7876) dekhara in the akhara of Balbala
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Maraketh
Historic

lines.flavourText: They believed themselves the most ordered, but that tradition turned their forests to salt.

lines.name: Intuitive Leap

explicitModifiers.text: Passives in Radius can be Allocated without being connected to your tree

lines.flavourText:
The carpenter who picks up a blade is not mad.
He's ambitious.

lines.name: Primordial Eminence

explicitModifiers.text: Golems have (16-20)% increased Attack and Cast Speed
30% increased Effect of Buffs granted by your Golems
Golems have +(805-998) to Armour
Primordial

lines.flavourText:
"Kings fall, empires crumble, mortals perish.
All turn to earth and sand."
- Maraketh proverb

lines.name: Lethal Pride

explicitModifiers.text:
Commanded leadership over (10033-17778) warriors under Akoya
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Karui

Commanded leadership over (10101-17931) warriors under Kaom
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Karui

Commanded leadership over (10036-17875) warriors under Rakiata
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Karui
Historic

lines.flavourText: They believed themselves the greatest warriors, but that savagery turned upon their own.

lines.name: Bound By Destiny

explicitModifiers.text: Consecrated Ground around you while stationary if 2 Crusader Items are Equipped
Every 4 seconds, Regenerate 35% of Life over one second if 2 Hunter Items are Equipped
Nearby Enemies are Unnerved if 2 Elder Items are Equipped
(1.84-2.6)% of Elemental Damage Leeched as Energy Shield if 2 Shaper Items are Equipped
14% increased Strength if 2 Warlord Items are Equipped
Unaffected by Ignite if 2 Warlord Items are Equipped
Nearby Enemies are Blinded if 2 Redeemer Items are Equipped
Unaffected by Shock if 2 Crusader Items are Equipped
Unaffected by Poison if 2 Hunter Items are Equipped
(10-14)% increased Intelligence if 2 Crusader Items are Equipped
(10-15)% increased maximum Life if 2 Elder Items are Equipped
(11-19)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate if 2 Shaper Items are Equipped
(10-13)% increased Dexterity if 2 Redeemer Items are Equipped
Projectiles Pierce 2 additional Targets if 2 Hunter Items are Equipped
Unaffected by Chill if 2 Redeemer Items are Equipped
(14-15)% increased maximum Mana if 2 Shaper Items are Equipped
(1.25-2.58)% of Physical Damage Leeched as Energy Shield if 2 Elder Items are Equipped
Nearby Enemies are Intimidated if 2 Warlord Items are Equipped
+(2-3)% to maximum Chaos Resistance if 4 Hunter Items are Equipped
Cannot take Reflected Physical Damage if 4 Elder Items are Equipped
+3% to maximum Cold Resistance if 4 Redeemer Items are Equipped
(6-8)% of Physical Damage taken as Lightning Damage if 4 Crusader Items are Equipped
(5-8)% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage if 4 Warlord Items are Equipped
+3% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage if 4 Elder Items are Equipped
Cannot take Reflected Elemental Damage if 4 Shaper Items are Equipped
Attacks have +(1.11-1.19)% to Critical Strike Chance if 4 Elder Items are Equipped
(10-15)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit if 4 Crusader Items are Equipped
(6-9)% of Physical Damage taken as Cold Damage if 4 Redeemer Items are Equipped
+(2-3)% to maximum Fire Resistance if 4 Warlord Items are Equipped
(10-14)% increased Movement Speed if 4 Hunter Items are Equipped
+(1.04-1.35)% to Spell Critical Strike Chance if 4 Shaper Items are Equipped
+3% to maximum Chance to Block Spell Damage if 4 Shaper Items are Equipped
+(2-3)% to maximum Lightning Resistance if 4 Crusader Items are Equipped
(10-14)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit if 4 Redeemer Items are Equipped

Gain 1 Endurance Charge every second if you've been Hit Recently and
4 Warlord Items are Equipped
(7-10)% of Elemental taken as Chaos Damage if 4 Hunter Items are Equipped
+1 to Maximum Frenzy Charges if 6 Redeemer Items are Equipped
+1 to Level of all Lightning Skill Gems if 6 Crusader Items are Equipped
+(1-2)% to all maximum Elemental Resistances if 6 Shaper Items are Equipped
+1 to Level of all Physical Skill Gems if 6 Elder Items are Equipped
+1 to Level of all Chaos Skill Gems if 6 Hunter Items are Equipped
(1.1-2.9)% of Physical Damage Prevented Recently is Regenerated as Energy Shield Per Second if 6 Crusader Items are Equipped
+1 to Maximum Endurance Charges if 6 Warlord Items are Equipped
Melee Hits Fortify if 6 Warlord Items are Equipped

Gain (10-13)% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element if
6 Shaper Items are Equipped
Cannot be Stunned if 6 Elder Items are Equipped
Cannot be Frozen if 6 Redeemer Items are Equipped
+1 to Level of all Cold Skill Gems if 6 Redeemer Items are Equipped
(12-15)% increased Attributes if 6 Elder Items are Equipped
+1 to Level of all non-Exceptional Support Gems if 6 Shaper Items are Equipped
You can apply an additional Curse if 6 Hunter Items are Equipped
+1 to Maximum Power Charges if 6 Crusader Items are Equipped

lines.flavourText:
The future weaves ever forward, twisting into itself forever,
driven by the passions and tragedies of those who seek.

lines.name: Grand Spectrum

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Minimum Power Charges per Grand Spectrum
25% increased Critical Strike Chance per Grand Spectrum
Minions have +10% to Critical Strike Multiplier per Grand Spectrum

lines.flavourText: A mass of flesh writhing with savage fury.

lines.name: Combat Focus

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Elemental Damage
With 40 total Strength and Intelligence in Radius, Prismatic Skills deal 50% less Cold Damage
With 40 total Strength and Intelligence in Radius, Prismatic Skills cannot choose Cold

lines.flavourText:
Kaom watched the torches patrol the top of the Watch. 
He observed the lay of the beach, its barricades and rocks, 
and his men in their canoes, ready to lay their lives down for him.
But when his foot hit the sand, he thought only of the fight.

lines.name: Combat Focus

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Elemental Damage
With 40 total Intelligence and Dexterity in Radius, Prismatic Skills deal 50% less Fire Damage
With 40 total Intelligence and Dexterity in Radius, Prismatic Skills cannot choose Fire

lines.flavourText:
Voll stood at the gates of Sarn, and a nation stood behind him. 
He thought of the righteousness of his cause, 
and of the glory he would bring to the empire he would soon lead. 
But as Chitus and his gemlings advanced, he thought only of the fight.

lines.name: Inspired Learning

explicitModifiers.text: With 4 Notables Allocated in Radius, When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain 1 of its Modifiers for 20 seconds

lines.flavourText:
If you do not learn from a won battle
then you have already lost the war.

lines.name: Lioneye's Fall

explicitModifiers.text: Melee and Melee Weapon Type modifiers in Radius are Transformed to Bow Modifiers

lines.flavourText:
The shield crab does not leave his shell unless it is forced to, 
and even then, it knows to keep its distance.

lines.name: Self-Flagellation
lines.flavourText: Beg for forgiveness.

lines.name: Pure Talent

explicitModifiers.text:
While your Passive Skill Tree connects to a class' starting location, you gain:
Marauder: Melee Skills have 25% increased Area of Effect
Duelist: 1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Ranger: 7% increased Movement Speed
Shadow: +0.5% to Critical Strike Chance
Witch: 0.5% of Mana Regenerated per second
Templar: Damage Penetrates 5% Elemental Resistances
Scion: +25 to All Attributes

lines.flavourText:
The skilled know how to learn.
The talented know who to learn from.

lines.name: Watcher's Eye

explicitModifiers.text: (4-6)% increased maximum Energy Shield
(4-6)% increased maximum Life
(4-6)% increased maximum Mana
(6-8)% additional Physical Damage Reduction while affected by Determination
+(634-960) to Armour while affected by Determination
Cannot be Blinded while affected by Precision
+(1.31-1.8)% to Critical Strike Chance while affected by Hatred
(40-60)% increased Attack Damage while affected by Precision
30% increased Maximum total Energy Shield Recovery per second from Leech while affected by Zealotry
Effects of Consecrated Ground you create while affected by Zealotry Linger for 2 seconds
(10-20)% of Fire and Lightning Damage taken as Cold Damage while affected by Purity of Ice
(30-45)% chance to Blind Enemies which Hit you while affected by Grace
+(20-29)% to Critical Strike Multiplier while affected by Precision
(15-20)% of Damage taken while affected by Clarity Recouped as Mana
You gain Onslaught for 4 seconds on Kill while affected by Haste
(41-59)% increased Cold Damage while affected by Hatred
+1% to all maximum Elemental Resistances while affected by Purity of Elements
(10-15)% increased Energy Shield Recovery Rate while affected by Discipline
+(5-8)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while affected by Determination
Immune to Shock while affected by Purity of Lightning
(10-15)% increased Attack Speed while affected by Precision
(26-40)% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage while affected by Anger
(10-14)% increased Movement Speed while affected by Grace
+(5-8)% chance to Evade Attack Hits while affected by Grace
+(5-8)% Chance to Block Spell Damage while affected by Discipline
(41-60)% increased Physical Damage while using Pride
You take (40-57)% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes while affected by Determination
Regenerate (1.5-2.5)% of Energy Shield per Second while affected by Discipline

Gain Arcane Surge for 4 seconds when you create Consecrated Ground while affected by Zealotry
Consecrated Ground you create while affected by Zealotry causes enemies to take (8-10)% increased Damage
Gain (20-27) Life per Enemy Hit while affected by Vitality
(25-40)% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage while affected by Hatred
(11-15)% increased Cast Speed while affected by Zealotry
Damage Penetrates (10-13)% Lightning Resistance while affected by Wrath

(101-120)% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground while affected by Zealotry
(41-60)% increased Lightning Damage while affected by Wrath
Immune to Freeze while affected by Purity of Ice
(25-39)% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage while affected by Wrath
(50-62)% increased Life Recovery from Flasks while affected by Vitality
(30-49)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Movement Skills used while affected by Haste

(14-19)% of Fire and Cold Damage taken as Lightning Damage while
affected by Purity of Lightning
Immune to Ignite while affected by Purity of Fire
Unaffected by Burning Ground while affected by Purity of Fire
(0.81-1.13)% of Damage leeched as Life while affected by Vitality
Unaffected by Vulnerability while affected by Determination
(40-49)% reduced Reflected Physical Damage taken while affected by Determination
Unaffected by Enfeeble while affected by Grace
+(12-15)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage while affected by Grace
Unaffected by Shocked Ground while affected by Purity of Lightning
(40-49)% reduced Reflected Elemental Damage taken while affected by Purity of Elements
Impales you inflict last 2 additional Hits while using Pride
(7-10)% of Damage taken from Mana before Life while affected by Clarity
(1.01-1.47)% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life while affected by Anger
Non-Channelling Skills have -(10-5) to Total Mana Cost while affected by Clarity
Your Hits Intimidate Enemies for 4 seconds while you are using Pride
You have Phasing while affected by Haste
Unaffected by Chilled Ground while affected by Purity of Ice
Critical Strikes Penetrate (8-10)% of Enemy Elemental Resistances while affected by Zealotry
(72-97)% increased Critical Strike Chance while affected by Wrath
Gain (16-24)% of Physical Damage as Extra Lightning Damage while affected by Wrath
Unaffected by Frostbite while affected by Purity of Ice
25% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks while using Pride
Damage Penetrates (11-15)% Cold Resistance while affected by Hatred
Gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike while affected by Precision
Unaffected by Conductivity while affected by Purity of Lightning
(40-60)% increased Fire Damage while affected by Anger
(10-15)% increased Life Recovery Rate while affected by Vitality
Gain (16-25)% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage while affected by Anger
Adds (58-69) to (89-102) Cold Damage while affected by Hatred
Unaffected by Poison while affected by Malevolence
Regenerate (1.07-1.5)% of Life per second while affected by Vitality
Damage Penetrates (10-15)% Fire Resistance while affected by Anger
Unaffected by Elemental Weakness while affected by Purity of Elements
Gain (20-30) Energy Shield per Enemy Hit while affected by Discipline
Debuffs on you expire (15-20)% faster while affected by Haste
(10-14)% chance to Recover 10% of Mana when you use a Skill while affected by Clarity
Damaging Ailments you inflict deal Damage (10-15)% faster while affected by Malevolence
(8-12)% chance to deal Double Damage while using Pride
Gain (6-10)% of Maximum Mana as Extra Maximum Energy Shield while affected by Clarity
(30-40)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge while affected by Discipline
(1-1.45)% of Lightning Damage is Leeched as Energy Shield while affected by Wrath
Unaffected by Bleeding while affected by Malevolence
(10-19)% of Cold and Lightning Damage taken as Fire Damage while affected by Purity of Fire
Unaffected by Temporal Chains while affected by Haste
+(18-22)% to Damage over Time Multiplier while affected by Malevolence
Unaffected by Flammability while affected by Purity of Fire
(8-12)% increased Recovery rate of Life and Energy Shield while affected by Malevolence
(10-15)% increased Mana Recovery Rate while affected by Clarity

lines.flavourText:
One by one, they stood their ground against a creature 
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

lines.name: Fortress Covenant
lines.flavourText: Forsake what you might have had. Command power beyond your potential.

lines.name: Natural Affinity

explicitModifiers.text: Adds Nature's Patience

lines.flavourText:
You can take the girl out of the woods, 
but you can't take the woods out of the girl.

lines.name: Kitava's Teachings

explicitModifiers.text: Adds Disciple of Kitava

lines.flavourText:
Savour the bitter, cherish the sweet,
For there may never be another chance to eat.

lines.name: Seething Fury
lines.flavourText:
The enslaved Ezomyte clans were not permitted to own weapons.
For years, they trained in secret, watching and waiting for the
perfect moment to reveal the true depth of the Empire's folly.

lines.name: Healthy Mind
lines.flavourText: For the ambitious, flesh is a limitation.

lines.name: Unending Hunger

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have (6-8)% increased Area of Effect
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Raised Spectres have a 50% chance to gain Soul Eater for 20 seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText:
They roamed, they fed, they grew,
Killing as they went,
Conquer though they may,
Their hearts will never be content.

lines.name: Replica Reckless Defence

explicitModifiers.text: +(2-6)% Chance to Block Spell Damage
+(2-6)% Chance to Block Attack Damage
+10% chance to be Frozen, Shocked and Ignited

lines.flavourText: "Prototype #298 must be contained in a non-conductive glass box at all times."

lines.name: Primordial Harmony

explicitModifiers.text: Golem Skills have (20-30)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Summoned Golems have (31-45)% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
(16-20)% increased Golem Damage for each Type of Golem you have Summoned
Summoned Golems Regenerate 2% of their Life per second
Primordial

lines.flavourText:
"A stone is not a stone.
It is but one part of a fortress."
- Ezomyte proverb

lines.name: Careful Planning
lines.flavourText:
"Greatly outnumbered, Deshret dressed her personal guard 
in identical garb. When the Empire rode north, Deshret and 
her guard took turns revealing themselves, creating the illusion 
of speed beyond the capabilities of even the Virtue Gems."
- History of the Maraketh

lines.name: Elegant Hubris

explicitModifiers.text:
Commissioned (2720-159560) coins to commemorate Victario
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Eternal Empire

Commissioned (7860-156160) coins to commemorate Caspiro
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Eternal Empire

Commissioned (3340-159060) coins to commemorate Cadiro
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Eternal Empire
Historic

lines.flavourText: They believed themselves better than the past, but that confidence brought about nightmare.

lines.name: Energised Armour
lines.flavourText: "I've yet to see prayer stop an arrow."

lines.name: Forbidden Flesh
lines.flavourText:
The bodies of those wholly subsumed by the Tangle
continue to merge and mutate and cry out for release...

lines.name: Tempered Mind

explicitModifiers.text: -1 Intelligence per 1 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% increased Mana Recovery Rate per 10 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius

lines.flavourText:
Any thought, no matter how fleeting, changes the thinker.

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Transcendence}

lines.name: Witchbane

explicitModifiers.text: +(5-15) to Intelligence

When you Kill an Enemy Cursed with a Non-Aura Hex, become Immune to
Curses for remaining Hex Duration

lines.flavourText:
In darkest night, 'neath waxen moon
A witch snatches a boy from his room.
He wards off her hexes
The witch he perplexes
And so becomes part of her stew.

lines.name: Fevered Mind
lines.flavourText: In sickness, the insane becomes sane.

lines.name: Atziri's Reign
lines.flavourText:
Atziri went to great lengths to ensure her immortality,
but nothing is eternal.

lines.name: The Golden Rule
lines.flavourText: Hurt as you would be hurt.

lines.name: Replica Powerlessness
lines.flavourText:
"The suppression troops have stopped responding to my orders.
I'm no longer in charge, and I likely never truly was... I suspect
they're already coming for us."
- Lead Researcher Ksaret, one hour post-Incident

lines.name: Powerlessness
lines.flavourText: "Your desires will mislead you."

lines.name: Reckless Defence
lines.flavourText:
There's no motivation for genius
quite like desperation.

lines.name: Fluid Motion
lines.flavourText: Even the strongest of steel can be made to bend.

lines.name: Firesong

explicitModifiers.text: +(10-15)% to Fire Resistance
Modifiers to Ignite Duration on you apply to all Elemental Ailments

lines.flavourText:
Within a firestorm, the Thane commands the flames
Emblazoned by glory and the song of the First Ones
For the master of fire fears nothing.

lines.name: Brute Force Solution
lines.flavourText:
Picking a lock takes an immense amount of skill and practice.
Breaking it with a hammer takes about three seconds.

lines.name: Fertile Mind
lines.flavourText:
"The swallow flew fast and took many turns,
spilling a seed where no plant had grown before. 
This seed grew and grew until the desert became fertile and abundant. 
Your mind is like this seed." 
- Maraketh Proverb

lines.name: Hidden Potential
lines.flavourText:
The difference between the master and his apprentice
is what they see when they look at the same block of wood.

lines.name: Efficient Training
lines.flavourText: Working smart and working hard aren't mutually exclusive.

lines.name: Fragility
lines.flavourText: "Your flesh will fail you."

lines.name: Inertia
lines.flavourText: There is no force without movement.

lines.name: Pacifism
lines.flavourText: "Your fear will overcome you."

lines.name: To Dust
lines.flavourText:
In the end, time comes for all of us.
For some, it comes much sooner.
